creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top blue border; red center with black floral cross stitch overlaid on three sides by light green rayon tape; wide embroidered flor and bird pattern in shades of pink, green, blue and black surrounds center red panel; some unfinished embroidery
title: Wall Hanging
